posts.title: Terra di mezzo
posts.excerpt: An early Garrone documentary in 3 episodes: “Silhouette”, “Euglen & Gertian” and “Self Service”. In three plainly told segments, the bleak lives of Third World immigrants are examined as they try to establish themselves in their new home in Italy. In true neorealistic style, the stars themselves are immigrants reenacting real-life situations. The first segment …

posts._title: Aleksei Balabanov – Pro urodov i lyudey AKA Of Freaks And Men (1998)
posts.title: Pro urodov i lyudey
posts.excerpt: Dariya the maid getting a boy to touch her large breast is just one incident that occurs when Yohan and Victor infiltrate two families, forcing young Liza and blind Ekaterina to appear in porn, but they are not so innocent themselves.

posts.title: Antifascist Attitude
posts.excerpt: SYNOPSIS:::: Anti-Fascist Attitude” is the first ever documentary on the emerging Russian anti-fascist movement which is made by the activists themselves. The movie features both moderate NGO activists and radical grassroots activists and anarchists from three cities – Moscow, St. Petersburg and Irkutsk. It also features Stanislav Markelov, murdered in Moscow on 19th January, 2009.

posts.title: Nippon Sengoshi – Madamu onboro no Seikatsu
posts.excerpt: Quote: The star of this documentary is a quintessential Imamura heroine: a hard-nosed, ruthless survivor, with a sense of loyalty and an earthy sense of humor.
